CreateNewUser: INSERT INTO profile (name, phone, email) VALUE (?, ?, ?)
CreateNewPassword: INSERT INTO pass (email, password) VALUE (?, AES_ENCRYPT(?, UNHEX(SHA2(?, 512))))
LoginCredentials: SELECT password FROM pass WHERE password = AES_ENCRYPT(?, UNHEX(SHA2(?, 512)))
ForgetEmail: SELECT email, name FROM profile WHERE email = ?
CreateTokenForgetPass: INSERT INTO token_list (date, token, email) VALUE (?, FROM_UNIXTIME(?), ?)
VerifyEmail: SELECT token, email FROM token_list WHERE token = ?
UpdatePassword: SET password = AES_ENCRYPT(?, UNHEX(SHA2(?, 512))) FROM pass WHERE email = ?
